mapper.select: SELECT mmu.user_id AS userId, mmu.nickname, mmu.sex AS sex, mmu.mobile, mmu.birthday, mmu.`name`, mmu.level AS userLevel, mmu.office_id AS officeId, tso.name AS officeName, mmu.beautician_id AS beautyId, tsu.`name` AS beautyName, mal.id AS 'appellationId', mal.name AS 'appellationName' FROM mtmydb.mtmy_users mmu LEFT JOIN trains.sys_office tso ON mmu.office_id = tso.id LEFT JOIN trains.sys_user tsu ON mmu.beautician_id = tsu.id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_appellation_label mal ON mal.id = mmu.appellation_id WHERE user_id =#{userId}

SELECT mui.mtmy_user_id AS 'userId', mui.name AS 'name', mui.mobile AS 'mobile', mui.idcard AS 'idCard', mui.lunar_birthday AS 'lunarBirthday', mui.`CHARACTER` AS 'character', mui.constellation AS 'constellation', mui.is_marrige AS 'isMarrige', mui.wedding_day AS 'weddingDay', mui.is_estate AS 'isEstate', mui.is_member AS 'isMember', mui.car_brand AS 'carBrand', mui.children AS 'children', mui.occupation AS 'occupation', mui.monthly_income AS 'income', mui.menstrual_date AS 'menstrualDate', mui.menstrual_peroid AS 'menstrualPeroid', mui.weight AS 'weight', mui.height AS 'height', mui.critical_diseases AS 'criticalDiseases', mui.promotion_agent AS 'promotionAgent', mui.c_using_brand AS 'usingBrand', mui.c_intrest AS 'intrest', mui.c_taboo AS 'taboo', mui.c_hate AS 'hate', mui.remark AS 'remark', mal.id AS 'appellationId', mal.name AS 'appellationName' FROM mtmydb.mtmy_user_info mui LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_users u ON u.user_id = mui.mtmy_user_id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_appellation_label mal ON mal.id = u.appellation_id WHERE mui.mtmy_user_id=#{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mtmydb.mtmy_user_info( mtmy_user_id, name, idcard, lunar_birthday, `character`, constellation, is_marrige, wedding_day, is_estate , is_member, car_brand, children , occupation, monthly_income , menstrual_date, menstrual_peroid, weight, height, critical_diseases, promotion_agent, c_using_brand, c_intrest, c_taboo, c_hate, remark, create_by , create_date ) VALUES( #{userId}, #{name}, #{idCard}, #{lunarBirthday}, #{character}, #{constellation}, #{isMarrige}, #{weddingDay}, #{isEstate}, #{isMember} , #{carBrand} , #{children}, #{occupation}, #{income} , #{menstrualDate}, #{menstrualPeroid}, #{weight} , #{height}, #{criticalDiseases}, #{promotionAgent}, #{usingBrand}, #{intrest}, #{taboo} , #{hate} , #{remark} , #{createBy.name}, SYSDATE() )
mapper.update: UPDATE mtmydb.mtmy_user_info SET name= #{name}, idcard=#{idCard}, lunar_birthday= #{lunarBirthday}, `character`= #{character}, constellation= #{constellation}, is_marrige= #{isMarrige}, wedding_day= #{weddingDay}, is_estate=#{isEstate}, is_member= #{isMember} , car_brand= #{carBrand} , children= #{children}, occupation= #{occupation}, monthly_income= #{income} , menstrual_date=#{menstrualDate}, menstrual_peroid=#{menstrualPeroid}, weight=#{weight}, height=#{height}, critical_diseases=#{criticalDiseases}, promotion_agent=#{promotionAgent}, c_using_brand=#{usingBrand} , c_intrest=#{intrest}, c_taboo= #{taboo}, c_hate= #{hate}, remark=#{remark} WHERE mtmy_user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT mu.user_id AS userId, mu.`name`, mu.sex, mu.mobile, mu.nickname, mu.level_value AS 'levelvalue', mu.reg_time regTime, mua.account_arrearage accountArrearage, MIN(mo.add_time) firstDate, MAX(mo.add_time) lastDate, muyl.`level` AS 'level', tsu.NAME AS 'beautyName', tso.NAME AS 'shopName', tso.id AS officeId, tsu.id AS beautyId FROM mtmydb.mtmy_users mu LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_user_accounts mua ON mu.user_id = mua.user_id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_orders mo ON mu.user_id = mo.user_id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_user_yz_level muyl ON mu.level_value >=muyl.min_val AND mu.level_value <=muyl.max_val LEFT JOIN trains.sys_user tsu ON mu.beautician_id = tsu.id LEFT JOIN trains.sys_office tso ON mu.office_id = tso.id WHERE mu.mobile = #{keyword} GROUP BY mu.user_id, muyl. NAME, muyl.`level` ORDER BY mu.reg_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE mtmydb.mtmy_users SET office_id=#{officeId}, office_name=(SELECT name FROM trains.sys_office WHERE id = #{officeId}), beautician_id= #{beautyId}, beautician_name=(SELECT name FROM trains.sys_user WHERE id = #{beautyId}), appellation_id = #{appellationId} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
